column2: BRIEF-American Assets Trust Reports Q1 FFO Per Share $0.51 May 1 (Reuters) - American Assets Trust Inc: * AMERICAN ASSETS TRUST, INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS * QTRLY SAME-STORE CASH NOI INCREASED 7% YEAR-OVER-YEAR FOR Q1 * AFFIRMS ITS GUIDANCE RANGE FOR FULL YEAR 2018 FFO PER DILUTED SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
